segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, completely unaware of the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so clever, taking cookies without her noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it looks so dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is being patient, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and it’s making a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm, like nothing is wrong inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever turn off the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are going to have a great time with those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn’t tip over and hurt someone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting so slippery, and it’s going to be a big mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
